text: Below is a list of all the power plants installed and operated by the central, private and state government of Telangana. == Non-renewable == === Thermal power === Thermal power is the "largest" source of power in Telangana state. There are different types of Thermal power plants based on the fuel used to generate the steam such as coal, gas, diesel etc. {| class="sortable wikitable" |-style="text-align:left;" ! Name !!
